pkgmetadata.longdescription: # pycowsayA talking cow!## RunUse [pipx](https://github.com/pipxproject/pipx) to run without permanently installing```pipx run pycowsay mooo``````>> pipx run pycowsay mooooo ------< mooooo > ------ \ ^__^ \ (oo)\_______ (__)\ )\/\ ||----w | || ||```## InstallUse [pipx](https://github.com/pipxproject/pipx) to install to isolated environment```pipx install pycowsay```or```pip install pycowsay```---```>> pycowsay mooooo ------< mooooo > ------ \ ^__^ \ (oo)\_______ (__)\ )\/\ ||----w | || ||```
